alert.note: Alert for Le Flore (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 02 at 4:47AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Le Flore County through 530 AM CDT... At 447 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles southwest of Fanshawe to 8 miles north of Muse to Octavia. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Poteau... Pocola... Heavener... Spiro... Panama... Wister... Howe... Bokoshe... Fanshawe... Cameron... Octavia... Heavener Runestone State Park... Big Cedar... Lake Wister State Park... Shady Point... Rock Island... Cowlington... Scullyville... Summerfield... Braden... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
